game.name: Roll The Bones
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Select spell-dice for your loadout, roll them, and wreak absolute havoc! In this fast-paced roguelite you will fight through dungeons using magic dice and chaotic spells.Let's roll some bones!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Select spell-dice for your loadout, roll them, and wreak absolute havoc! In this fast-paced roguelite you will fight through dungeons using magic dice and chaotic spells.Let's roll some bones!
